scripts.prestart: handlebars views/partials/highscoreBox.handlebars -f public/highscoreBox.js && handlebars views/partials/menu.handlebars -f public/menu.js && handlebars views/partials/pauseModal.handlebars -f public/pauseModal.js
scripts.predev: handlebars views/partials/highscoreBox.handlebars -f public/highscoreBox.js && handlebars views/partials/menu.handlebars -f public/menu.js && handlebars views/partials/pauseModal.handlebars -f public/pauseModal.js

name: four-dimensional-maze-site
description: A website that lets users generate and navigate a maze in four dimensions.
